Reverse image search: The expert conducted a reverse image search on Google to verify the authenticity of the claim. This search led to the discovery that the images of weapons were actually from unrelated incidents in Pakistan, not from the Jamia Millia Islamia University campus.
Comparison with news articles: The expert compared the images with news articles and reports from reputable sources. They found that the images were associated with incidents at Abdul Wali Khan University in Pakistan's Mardan district and a local court in Islamabad, further confirming that they were not related to the claim.
Malayalam text on Facebook: The expert noted that several individuals on Facebook had posted the same images with Malayalam text, suggesting that the claim was being widely shared in that language. This observation added to the evidence that the claim was false.
Lack of connection to Jamia Millia Islam: The expert concluded that the images had no connection to the Jamia Millia Islamia University campus, where the claim alleged the weapons were recovered. This lack of connection further discredited the claim's authenticity.
